Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to an incident at Howard

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to an incident at Howard.

Shuttle bus service is available between Howard and Skokie/Dempster, serving all affected stations during normal hours of operation.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include the #97 Skokie bus route.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #2 Hyde Park Express, #148 Clarendon/Michigan Express Temporary Reroute near State/Washington
ShortDescription: 2 Hyde Park Exp., 148 Clarendon/Michigan Exp. buses rrtd SB: State,Washington, Michigan, Randolph, & State; NB: Michigan, Wacker, Clark, Washington, and State.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#2 Hyde Park Express, #148 Clarendon/Michigan Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near State/Washington, due to street blockage.

Southbound buses will operate via State, Washington, Michigan, Randolph, and State.

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Wacker, Clark, Washington, and State.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Reroute at Beverly/99th
ShortDescription: 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Beverly, 99th, Vincennes, and 103rd due to, construction near Beverly/99th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Beverly, 99th, Vincennes, and 103rd due to, construction near Beverly/99th.

Allow extra travel time.
